sentences.en: ‘What do they quarrel about?’ queried Ruth. ‘Ask me another.’.
sentences.cn: “他们在吵什么？”鲁思问。“我也不知道。”。

sentences.en: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.cn: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.en: Ask the butcher for soup bones (marrow bones are best).
sentences.cn: 跟肉铺老板要煲汤用的骨头（最好是髓骨）。

sentences.en: Can I just ask something 'cos I'm really quite interested in this.
sentences.cn: 我能不能问个问题，因为我对这个真的很感兴趣。

sentences.en: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.cn: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.en: Don't you think we should ask this young man some technical questions?
sentences.cn: 你不觉得我们应该向这位年轻人请教几个技术问题吗？

sentences.en: He intends to ask the court to think again.
sentences.cn: 他打算请求法庭再重新审度。

sentences.en: I decided to go to the next house and ask for food.
sentences.cn: 我决定去隔壁那家要点吃的。

sentences.en: I phoned my mother to ask what time she was coming home.
sentences.cn: 我打电话给母亲问她几点回家。

sentences.en: I'm amazed they had the cheek to ask in the first place.
sentences.cn: 我真惊讶他们当初竟然有脸问。

sentences.en: I've come to ask you to do me a favour.
sentences.cn: 我来这儿是想请你帮个忙。

sentences.en: if you ask me, it's just an excuse for laziness.
sentences.cn: 依我看，这不过是一个偷懒的借口。

sentences.en: If you need anything, you only have to ask.
sentences.cn: 你需要什么，只要提出来就行。

sentences.en: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.cn: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

sentences.en: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.cn: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: People don'tlike to ask questions for fear of appearing ignorant.
sentences.cn: 人们不喜欢问问题，害怕自己会显得很无知。

sentences.en: ringing me up on Christmas Day, I ask you!.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节给我打电话，这说得过去吗？。

sentences.en: That kid’s always asking awkward questions .
sentences.cn: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.en: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.cn: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.en: That silly old bat. I ask you, who'd she think she was?
sentences.cn: 那个老蠢货。我倒要问一问，她以为她是谁呀？

sentences.en: That was Nicholas's cue to ask for another chocolate chip cookie.
sentences.cn: 那表示尼古拉斯还想要一块巧克力曲奇。

sentences.en: the job was his for the asking.
sentences.cn: 要得到那工作对他来说简直是探囊取物。

sentences.en: They try to tease out the answers without appearing to ask.
sentences.cn: 他们试图不动声色地套出答案。

sentences.en: We rang Duncan to ask where he was going on holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们打电话给邓肯，问他要去哪里度假。

sentences.en: Will she say yes when I ask her out?
sentences.cn: 我约她出去，她会答应吗？

sentences.en: You begin to ask yourself what kind of person perpetrated this crime.
sentences.cn: 你开始自问是什么样的人犯下这样的罪行。

sentences.en: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.cn: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

phrases.tran_cn: (澳/新西兰，非正式)难以满足的要求

phrases.phrase: ask for it 或 ask for trouble 【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 自讨苦吃，自找麻烦：坚持某一行为，尽管这一行动将可能导致困境或惩罚
(非正式)[用于表示不知道问题的答案] 我不知道
(非正式)[用于表示不知道问题的答案并对被问到很感惊讶或恼火] 别问我，我不知道！
[用于表示如果想得到某种东西就能轻易到手]只需提出要求便能得到
(非正式)[用于表示惊诧或不赞成，意在使听者表示同意自己刚说过的话]这算怎么回事！这说得过去吗？
(非正式)[用于强调所言仅是个人看法] 我认为，依我看

trans.tran_en: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

trans.tran_cn: （询）问，请求，要求，征求，求见，邀请
